title: Albert Heijn
description: Created a versatile signage software for Albert Heijn's staff room display. The software showcases the current time and date, photo slideshows, announcements, and more, enhancing internal communication and creating a dynamic and informative environment for employees.

modal.title: Albert Heijn
modal.description: Created a versatile signage software for Albert Heijn's staff room display. The software showcases the current time and date, photo slideshows, announcements, and more, enhancing internal communication and creating a dynamic and informative environment for employees.

challenges.title: Challenges & Solutions
challenges.description: Designing an intuitive interface that could be easily updated by non-technical staff while ensuring reliable operation in a corporate environment with minimal maintenance requirements.
